comment: Smart data models - ShadingDevice schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.S4BLDG/master/ShadingDevice/schema.json
description: Shading devices are purpose built devices to protect from the sunlight, from natural light, or screening them from view. Shading devices can form part of the facade or can be mounted inside the building, they can be fixed or operable.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: hasManufacturer
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: hasModel
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: isExternal
contents.comment: Property. Indication whether the element is designed for use in the exterior (TRUE) or not (FALSE). If (TRUE) it is an external element and faces the outside of the building.

contents.name: mechanicalOperated
contents.comment: Property. Indication whether the element is operated machanically (TRUE) or not, i.e. manually (FALSE).

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: roughness
contents.comment: Property. A measure of the vertical deviations of the surface.

contents.name: shadingDeviceType
contents.comment: Property. Specifies the type of shading device.

contents.name: solarReflectance
contents.comment: Property. (Rsol): The ratio of incident solar radiation that is reflected by a shading system (also named _e). Note the following equation Asol + Rsol + Tsol = 1

contents.name: solarTransmittance
contents.comment: Property. (Tsol) The ratio of incident solar radiation that directly passes through a shading system (also named _e). Note the following equation Asol + Rsol + Tsol = 1

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: thermalTransmittance
contents.comment: Property. Rate at which energy is transmitted through a body. Usually measured in Watts/m2 Kelvin.

contents.name: visibleLightReflectance
contents.comment: Property. Fraction of the visible light that is reflected by the glazing at normal incidence. It is a value without unit.

contents.name: visibleLightTransmittance
contents.comment: Property. Fraction of the visible light that passes the shading system at normal incidence. It is a value without unit.

contents.name: isSubSystemOf
contents.comment: Relationship. A reference to a system(s) that this Physical Object is part of.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
